pr_title: Add gap-based balance limits for TopicReplicaDistributionGoal

timeline.message: Add gap-based balance limits for TopicReplicaDistributionGoal

timeline.bodyText: Nit: shouldn't the type be int since getInt is used? I know that casting an int to long is safe. Just wondering is it intentional?
timeline.author: Lincong
Lincong

timeline.bodyText: Should we allow topicReplicaBalanceMinGap  == topicReplicaBalanceMaxGap? In this case, the computedLimit is essentially ignored in the gapBasedBalanceLimit method since the return value of this method does not depend on computedLimit
timeline.author: Lincong

replies.bodyText:
We intentionally allow equality of min/max gaps.
As per their discretion, this enables users to configure their goal such that each topic has deterministic limits on each broker that is independent of the percentage-based computedLimit.
replies.author: efeg
